data.text: Mafalisayo wayagwe na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa walawile Yelusalemu weza wailundiza haulongozi wa Yesu.
Wona wanahina wayagwe wa Yesu woja vakuja kuno makono gao ganyolodoke, kwavija gakala hagananavigwa.
Kwavija Mafalisayo na Wayahudi wose, hawaja mbaka wasunguse ng'hani makono gao kamba viilondigwa, sama ya kuwinza mafundo ga wahenga zao.
Hawaja kinhu chochose kilawa hadisoko mbaka wakisuluze. Na wawinza mafundo bwando gawabokele kulawa mwa wahenga zao, kamba vija, kusuluza vikasi, viteleko, na via va shaba.
Avo, Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wamuuza Yesu, “Habali wanahina zako hawagawinza mafundo gatufundizigwe na wahenga, ila woja na makono ganyolodoke?”
Yesu kawedika yolonga, “Muhokozi Isaya kahokola goya viyahokole yowalonga mweye! Mweye videlenya, kamba vija viyandike,
Wonitambikila nie bule,
Mzika hamgwazo ndagizi za Mulungu, na mgawinza mafundo ga wanhu.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Muna ubala wa kuzilema ndagizi za Mulungu giladi mgatunize mafundo genu wenyego.
Musa kalagiza, ‘Wahishimile tataako na mamaako,’ na ‘Munhu yoyose yomulonga vihile tataake ama mamaake, yakomigwe.’
Ila mweye mofundiza kamba, kamba munhu kana kinhu cha kumgwelela tata ama mamaake, ila yahalonga, ‘Kinhu kino kicho Kolubani,’ nhegulo yake, ‘Nhosa ya Mulungu,’
avo halondigwa kuwataza mkuwagwelela vinhu tata na mamaake.
Vino vivo mafundo gamuwafundiza wanhu vigobeza mbuli za Mulungu. Na kuna vinhu viyagwe bwando kamba vino vimtenda.”
Abaho, Yesu kadikema kabili didale da wanhu, kawalongela, “Nitegelezeni na m'vitange.
Haduhu kinhu kimwingila munhu kulawa kunze chondakimtende munhu yanyolodoke. Ila kija kimulawa munhu, kicho kimtenda munhu yanyolodoke.”
Munhu yali na magwiti ga kuhulika, na yahulike!
Viyadilekile didale da wanhu na kwingila mng'anda, wanahina zake wamulonda yawalongele goya hala dino.
Yesu kawalongela, “Na mweye vivija hamnavitanga? Ham'vimanya kamba kinhu chochose kingila mgati mwa munhu kulawa kunze hakidaha kumnyolodosa,
kwavija hakimwingila mmoyo, ila mmunda, abaho, chochola kucholo?” Viyalongile vino, Yesu kavilonga vakuja vose vidigwe.
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Kija kimulawa munhu kicho kimtenda yanyolodoke.
Kwavija kulawa mgati ya umoyo wa munhu, molawa ngelegeza zihile, ugoni, ubavi, kukoma,
ugoni, ugila, kutenda gehile, sulukila ya ugoni, uzenzeleganye, sulukila za kulonda vinhu bwando, migongo, kuilonga vihile, magoda, na ubozi.
Mbuli zose zino zihile zilawa mgati mwa munhu na zizo zimtenda yanyolodoke.”
Yesu kalawa kachola muisi ili behi na wambo da Tilo. Kengila muna ing'anda imwe na halondile munhu yoyose yavitange kamba kahaja, ila hadahile kuifisa.
Mtwanzi imwe, mndele wake yakalile na kinyamkela, kahulika mbuli za Yesu, hima kamwizila kamfugamila mavindi haulongozi wake.
Mtwanzi ija kakala Mmhazi, yaleligwe ng'ambu ya Foinike muisi ya Silia. Kaiyalala yomulongela Yesu yamuwinge ikinyamkela yam'vamhile mndele wake.
Ila Yesu kamwidika, “Beta tanhu iwana wegute. Havinogile kusola mandia ga wana na kuwagwelela umbwa.”
Ija mtwanzi kamwidika, “Mndewa! Hata umbwa woja vakuja viwasigaze iwana hasi ya imeza.”
Avo Yesu kamulongela, “Sama ya mbuli zako zino, genda ukae kom'vika kinyamkela kamulawa mndele wako!”
Kachola ukae kam'vika mwanage yawasile mulusazi, na kweli kinyamkela kamulawa.
Abaho, Yesu kasegela muna iisi ya Tilo, kachola Lamba da Galilaya kubitila Sidoni mbaka muisi ya viwambo longo dimwe vikemigwa Dekapoli.
Wanhu wamgalila munhu yakalile kinziwi na bubui, wamuyalalila Yesu yamwikile makono gake.
Yesu kamsola yeiyeka, kamgala kutali na ididale da wanhu, kagela vidole vake mmagwiti ga ija imunhu, kazenha vizite, abaho, kalukwasa lulimi lwake.
Abaho, Yesu kalola uchana kuulanga, kabweza mhumuzi, na kumulongela ija imunhu, “Efata!” Nhegulo yake, “Vuguka!”
Bahaja munhu ija magwiti gake gahulika, kigagaziko chake kisegezigwa, avo kasonga kulongelela bila kugaya.
Abaho, Yesu kawagong'ondeza wanhu sambiwamulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ija. Ila avija viyakalile yowagong'ondeza ng'hani vivo vowokala wobwililisa ng'hani.
Wanhu wose wahulike wakanganya ng'hani na walonga, “Kila kinhu kotenda goya! Kawatenda hata vinziwi wahulike na mabubui walonge!”
